targets.rawSql: SELECT NOW() as time, value_str as status_text FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'Status' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT NOW() as time, value_num as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'ActualCycleTimeS' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT NOW() as time, value_num as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'ProductionOrderProgressPct' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT DISTINCT ON (metric) metric, COALESCE(value_str, CAST(value_num AS TEXT)) as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric IN ('Article', 'ProductionOrder', 'TotalPCBsOrder', 'PCBsCompletedGood') ORDER BY metric, time DESC
SELECT NOW() as time, value_num as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'Feeder01Count' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT NOW() as time, value_num as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'Feeder02Count' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT NOW() as time, value_num as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'Feeder03Count' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT NOW() as time, value_num as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'Feeder04Count' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT NOW() as time, value_num as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'VisionPassRatePct' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time", value_num FROM opcua_data WHERE $__timeFilter("time") AND metric = 'ActualAccuracyXum' ORDER BY 1
SELECT "time", value_num FROM opcua_data WHERE $__timeFilter("time") AND metric = 'ActualAccuracyYum' ORDER BY 1
SELECT NOW() as time, value_num as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'VacuumPressureKPa' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT NOW() as time, value_num as value FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'NozzleChangeCount' ORDER BY opcua_data.time DESC LIMIT 1

WITH last_running AS (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(time), '1970-01-01'::timestamp) as clear_time FROM opcua_data WHERE metric = 'Status' AND value_str = 'Running') SELECT o.time, translate(o.value_str, '[]''"', '') as message, o.operator FROM opcua_data o, last_running lr WHERE o.metric = 'ActiveAlarms' AND o.value_str != '' AND o.value_str != '[]' AND (o.value_str LIKE '%Info:%' OR (o.value_str LIKE '%Error:%' AND o.time > lr.clear_time) OR (o.value_str NOT LIKE '%Info:%' AND o.value_str NOT LIKE '%Error:%' AND o.time > lr.clear_time)) ORDER BY o.time DESC LIMIT 50
SELECT bucket as time, avg_value, min_value, max_value FROM machine_stats_minute WHERE metric = 'ActualCycleTimeS' AND $__timeFilter(bucket) ORDER BY bucket
SELECT bucket as time, avg_value, min_value, max_value FROM machine_stats_minute WHERE metric = 'ActualAccuracyXum' AND $__timeFilter(bucket) ORDER BY bucket
SELECT bucket as time, avg_value, min_value, max_value FROM machine_stats_minute WHERE metric = 'ActualAccuracyYum' AND $__timeFilter(bucket) ORDER BY bucket
SELECT bucket as time, sample_count as "Data Points" FROM machine_stats_minute WHERE metric = 'ActualCycleTimeS' AND $__timeFilter(bucket) ORDER BY bucket
SELECT bucket as time, avg_value, min_value, max_value FROM machine_stats_hourly WHERE metric = 'ActualPlacementRateCPH' AND $__timeFilter(bucket) ORDER BY bucket
